about.details:
Incorporated in March 2021, Excellent Wires and Packaging Limited manufactures a wide range of wires and wire ropes under the brand name "Excellent", including various types such as Spring Steel Wire, High Carbon Wire, Galvanised Wire (GI Wire), and others for multiple applications.

The company's products can be categorised into the following

  • Brass Wires & Products
  • Steel Wires & Products
  • Other Products viz. Packaging Products

The company's products are supplied to various industries such as Packaging, Engineering, Stationery, Imitation Jewellry, Wires & Cable etc.

The company has been awarded the ISO 9001:2015 Certification, an internationally recognized standard for ensuring effective quality management.

As of July 2024, the company employed 18 people in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO?
faqs.answer:
Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO is a SME IPO of 1400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹90 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on September 11, 2024, and closes on September 13, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO opens on September 11, 2024 and closes on September 13, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO?
faqs.answer: Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO will be done on Monday, September 16, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 17, 2024. Check the Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Excellent Wires and Packaging IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 19, 2024.
